# Fleet Management System - Python Flask Application

This is a web-based Fleet Vehicle and Maintenance Management System built with Python Flask.

## Project Structure
- Flask web application with SQLite database
- Bootstrap UI for responsive design
- CRUD operations for vehicles and maintenance records
- Dashboard with fleet statistics
- Search and filter functionality
- Maintenance alerts and tracking

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.8+
- Flask web framework
- SQLAlchemy ORM
- SQLite database
- Bootstrap 5 for UI
- Jinja2 templating

## Development Notes
- Database models: Vehicle, MaintenanceRecord
- Main routes: dashboard, vehicles, maintenance
- Templates use Bootstrap 5 components
- SQLite database stored in instance folder
